title: Implement Primary Device Attribute (DA1) response
description:
Fish shell shows warning on startup:

```
warning: fish could not read response to Primary Device Attribute query after waiting for 2 seconds.
This is often due to a missing feature in your terminal.
See 'help terminal-compatibility' or 'man fish-terminal-compatibility'.
This fish process will no longer wait for outstanding queries, which disables some optional features.
```

Need to implement DA1 response in the terminal emulator.
close_reason: Implemented DA1/DA2 response in pane.zig. Terminal now responds to CSI c with VT220+color capabilities.

title: Implement window-padding options
description:
Add padding around terminal content.
Options: window-padding-x = 6, window-padding-y = 6
Difficulty: Simple - CSS padding on terminal container
close_reason: Removed - terminal padding now controlled by spacing mode (--space-2 CSS variable)

title: Implement cursor-style-blink option
description:
Enable/disable cursor blinking.
Options: cursor-style-blink = false | true
Difficulty: Simple - toggle CSS animation
close_reason: Implemented cursor-style-blink with dropdown: (auto) = blink by default, true = always blink, false = never blink. CSS animation via cursor-blink class.

title: Implement shell-integration-features option
description:
Configure shell integration behavior.
Options: shell-integration-features=no-cursor
This controls what shell integration features are enabled.
Difficulty: Complex - requires shell integration protocol support

title: Implement cursor-style config option
description:
Allow configuring cursor shape.
Options: cursor-style = block | bar | underline
Difficulty: Simple - different CSS for each style
close_reason: Implemented all 4 Ghostty cursor styles: block, bar, underline, block_hollow with CSS pseudo-elements

title: Implement adjust-cell-width/height options
description:
Fine-tune cell dimensions.
Options: adjust-cell-width = -1, adjust-cell-height = -2
Difficulty: Medium - need to calculate and apply to cell sizing
close_reason: Deferred - cell width not feasible in DOM, needs Canvas renderer. Cell height can use line-height but not exact. Implementing lineHeight setting separately.

title: Implement cursor-color config option
description:
Allow configuring cursor color.
Options: cursor-color = #aaff00
Already have --term-cursor-bg, just need config UI.
Difficulty: Simple
close_reason: Implemented cursor-color with theme default, cell-foreground, cell-background options

title: Send terminal resize to server when dimensions change
description:
When client calculates new terminal dimensions (via useTerminalDimensions hook), send resize message to server so it can resize the PTY.

Location: client/src/components/App.tsx in handleDimensionsChange callback

Requires:
- WebSocket message type for resize (cols, rows)
- Server handler to resize PTY (ioctl TIOCSWINSZ)
- Debounce on client to avoid flooding during drag resize

title: Implement cursor-text config option
description:
Text color when cursor is over a character.
Options: cursor-text = #000000
Already have --term-cursor-fg, just need config.
Difficulty: Simple
close_reason: Implemented cursor-text with theme default, cell-foreground, cell-background options (applies to block cursor)

title: IME support for CJK input
description:
Add Input Method Editor support for Chinese/Japanese/Korean text input.

Requires hidden textarea approach - see docs/ime-support.md for implementation notes.

Key points:
- Hidden textarea with opacity:0 (not display:none)
- CompositionEvent API (compositionstart/update/end)
- Position near cursor for IME popup
- Also enables mobile virtual keyboard support

title: Implement font-feature config option
description:

Options: font-feature=+NWID (natural width), +ss01, etc.
Difficulty: Medium - use font-feature-settings CSS property
close_reason: Implemented - fontFeature config with text input in Settings, applies to font-feature-settings CSS property

title: Implement cursor-opacity config option
description:
Cursor transparency.
Options: cursor-opacity = 1.0 (0.0 to 1.0)
Difficulty: Simple - CSS opacity property
close_reason: Implemented cursor-opacity with number input (0.0-1.0), applies to all cursor styles via --term-cursor-opacity CSS variable

title: Add IPC command for sending terminal input
description:
Add an IPC command to send input to the active pane's PTY.

Current IPC system only supports enum commands without parameters.
Need to either:
1. Extend IPC protocol to support parameterized commands
2. Add a separate data channel for input

Use case: scripting/automation, piping data to terminal from CLI

close_reason: Implemented client-side config system with localStorage persistence, get(key, fallback) pattern, and liquid glass settings modal

Difficulty: Simple - window.getSelection().removeAllRanges()

title: Implement DEC Mode 12 (AT&T cursor blink) support
description:
When cursor-style-blink is set to auto (empty string), respect DEC Mode 12 escape sequences to toggle cursor blinking on/off.

Also support DECSCUSR (CSI q) for cursor style changes from running programs.

Reference: Ghostty docs state that with auto mode, DEC Mode 12 controls blinking, while explicit true/false ignores it but still respects DECSCUSR.

Requires:
- Server to parse and track DEC Mode 12 state
- Server to send cursor blink state in snapshots
- Client to use server state when config is auto

title: Implement bell title change
description:
Change page title on bell.
Options: bell-features=title
Difficulty: Simple - document.title manipulation

description:

Options:

title: Implement font-family config option

Allow configuring the terminal font family via CSS variable or config.
Options: font-family = Iosevka, Aporetic Sans Mono, etc.
Difficulty: Simple - just set --term-font CSS variable
close_reason: Already implemented - fontFamily in config with Settings UI and --term-font CSS variable

title: Fix memory leak in IPC command handler
description:
In server.zig handleCommand(), the status and help commands allocate response data that is never freed. The TODO on line 88 notes this: 'Note: This leaks, but server is long-running so it's fine for now'.

Fix: Use an arena allocator per-request that gets freed after sendResponse().
